q: . Speaking of corporate shake-ups, Mountain View Internet juggernaut Google revealed that co-founder Larry Page will become CEO effective April 4. Current CEO Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman, and co-founder Sergey Brin will remain co-founder, devoting his Tim Cooke and energy to strategic projects, Eric Schmidt wrote in a blog post.`` As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated,'' Eric Schmidt noted.`` So Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long Tim Cooke how

this matters Since Eric Schmidt came on board at Google in 2001, the three have run the company as a team. Based on the trio's comments, they plan to continue to collaborate, but Eric Schmidt says Larry Page is ready to lead the company. Google is coming off a strong fourth quarter, too, with revenues of$ 6.4 billion, up 26 percent from last year. It will need to keep up the momentum in 2011 as

He said the electorate was expecting that focus when Barack Obama assumed office. I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment, which I think is the major problem facing American right now, and I think, and I hope, this will be the centerpiece of the State of the Union speech, Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley .`` We didn't elect` Superman,' we elected a human being.''
